Room Feature

The City View King Rooms offer elegant residential grace with four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful Manhattan views. These rooms feature 350 square feet and are situated on floors 5 to 21.

Bed & Bath Experience

The City View Rooms are spacious and feature a plush and comfortable king bed with unparalleled view of Manhattan’s iconic skyline. The room also features a nightstand, Bose Wave studio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock and an executive writing desk and chair. A 40” wall mounted TV and console with minibar is located across the bed.The Turkish marble-clad bathroom features glass enclosed shower, soaking tub, plush bathrobes and towels and Etro bath amenities.
